name: CONSUME (ShadowIgnition)
description:
Made for an Eight Hour Game Jam :)

CONSUME the hellish hots AND the hellish dogs, BUT also the hellish topping-less pizzas.

Avoid enemies that are larger than you, CONSUME THE WEAK to gain power.

Stronger hellish beings come to CONSUME you, whilst the weaker flee.

(Screenshots showcase work in progress, not the final release)
(Music: Demilitarized Zone - Ethan Meixsell)
